verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to make <S%H3772><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he made <S%H3772><s%> with them in Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, You have seen <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> his land; <S%H776><s%>

The great <S%H1419><s%> temptations <S%H4531><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen, <S%H7200><s%> the signs, <S%H226><s%> and those <S%H1992><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> miracles: <S%H4159><s%>

Yet the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has not given <S%H5414><s%> you an heart <S%H3820><s%> to perceive, <S%H3045><s%> and eyes <S%H5869><s%> to see, <S%H7200><s%> and ears <S%H241><s%> to hear, <S%H8085><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And I have led <S%H3212><s%> you forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> your clothes <S%H8008><s%> are not waxen old <S%H1086><s%> on you, and your shoe <S%H5275><s%> is not waxen old <S%H1086><s%> on your foot. <S%H7272><s%>

You have not eaten <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have you drunk <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong drink: <S%H7941><s%> that you might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

And when you came <S%H935><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> us to battle, <S%H4421><s%> and we smote <S%H5221><s%> them:

And we took <S%H3947><s%> their land, <S%H776><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> it for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4520><s%>

Keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them, that you may prosper <S%H7919><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that you do. <S%H6213><s%>

You stand <S%H5324><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of you before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> your captains <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> your elders, <S%H2205><s%> and your officers, <S%H7860><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

Your little <S%H2945><s%> ones, your wives, <S%H802><s%> and your stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is in your camp, <S%H4264><s%> from the hewer <S%H2404><s%> of your wood <S%H6086><s%> to the drawer <S%H7579><s%> of your water: <S%H4325><s%>

That you should enter <S%H5674><s%> into covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and into his oath, <S%H423><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> makes <S%H3772><s%> with you this day: <S%H3117><s%>

That he may establish <S%H6965><s%> you to day <S%H3117><s%> for a people <S%H5971><s%> to himself, and that he may be to you a God, <S%H430><s%> as he has said <S%H1696><s%> to you, and as he has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> with you only <S%H905><s%> do I make <S%H3772><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and this <S%H2063><s%> oath; <S%H423><s%>

But with him that stands <S%H5975><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> with us this day <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> and also with him that is not here <S%H6311><s%> with us this day: <S%H3117><s%>

(For you know <S%H3045><s%> how <S%H834><s%> we have dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and how <S%H834><s%> we came <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you passed <S%H5674><s%> by;

And you have seen <S%H7200><s%> their abominations, <S%H8251><s%> and their idols, <S%H1544><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone, <S%H68><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were among them:)

Lest <S%H6435><s%> there should be among you man, <S%H376><s%> or <S%H176><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%> or <S%H176><s%> family, <S%H4940><s%> or <S%H176><s%> tribe, <S%H7626><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> turns <S%H6437><s%> away this day <S%H3117><s%> from the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of these <S%H1992><s%> nations; <S%H1471><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> there should be among you a root <S%H8328><s%> that bears <S%H6509><s%> gall <S%H7219><s%> and wormwood; <S%H3939><s%>

And it come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when he hears <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> curse, <S%H423><s%> that he bless <S%H1288><s%> himself in his heart, <S%H3824><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I shall have peace, <S%H7965><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> I walk <S%H3212><s%> in the imagination <S%H8307><s%> of my heart, <S%H3820><s%> to add <S%H5595><s%> drunkenness <S%H7302><s%> to thirst: <S%H6771><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will not spare <S%H5545><s%> him, but then <S%H227><s%> the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> and his jealousy <S%H7068><s%> shall smoke <S%H6225><s%> against that man, <S%H376><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the curses <S%H423><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> shall lie <S%H7257><s%> on him, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall blot <S%H4229><s%> out his name <S%H8034><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall separate <S%H914><s%> him to evil <S%H7451><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the curses <S%H423><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> of the law: <S%H8451><s%>

So that the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come <S%H314><s%> of your children <S%H1121><s%> that shall rise <S%H6965><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> you, and the stranger <S%H5237><s%> that shall come <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> when they see <S%H7200><s%> the plagues <S%H4347><s%> of that land, <S%H776><s%> and the sicknesses <S%H8463><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has laid <S%H2470><s%> on it;

And that the whole <S%H3605><s%> land <S%H776><s%> thereof is brimstone, <S%H1614><s%> and salt, <S%H4417><s%> and burning, <S%H8316><s%> that it is not sown, <S%H2232><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> bears, <S%H6779><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%> grows <S%H5927><s%> therein, like the overthrow <S%H4114><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> Admah, <S%H126><s%> and Zeboim, <S%H6636><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> overthrew <S%H2015><s%> in his anger, <S%H639><s%> and in his wrath: <S%H2534><s%>

Even all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> has the LORD <S%H3068><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> thus <S%H3660><s%> to this <S%H2063><s%> land? <S%H776><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> means the heat <S%H2750><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> anger? <S%H639><s%>

Then men shall say, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> they have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he made <S%H3772><s%> with them when he brought <S%H3318><s%> them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

For they went <S%H3212><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> them, gods <S%H430><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they knew <S%H3045><s%> not, and whom <S%H834><s%> he had not given <S%H2505><s%> to them:

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against this <S%H1931><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> on it all <S%H3605><s%> the curses <S%H7045><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> book: <S%H5612><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rooted <S%H5428><s%> them out of their land <S%H127><s%> in anger, <S%H639><s%> and in wrath, <S%H2534><s%> and in great <S%H1419><s%> indignation, <S%H7110><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> another <S%H312><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

The secret <S%H5641><s%> things belong to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God: <S%H430><s%> but those things which are revealed <S%H1540><s%> belong to us and to our children <S%H1121><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> that we may do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> law. <S%H8451><s%>
